schemaDescription: document_id: string: Optional Google Document ID
document_name: string: Optional Google Document name
tab_id: string: Optional tab ID to filter comments to a specific tab
tab_index: integer: Optional tab index to filter comments to a specific tab
tab_title: string: Optional tab title to filter comments to a specific tab
metadata.actionSignature: action/args: "oauth_access_token: OAuth2Secret[Literal['google'], list[Literal['https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive.readonly', 'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/documents.readonly']]], document_id: str=None, document_name: str=None, tab_id: str=None, tab_index: int=None, tab_title: str=None"
